Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met  Cecilie Amanda Højgaard at a charity gala in Madrid. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.

Family Background: Cecilie Amanda Højgaard is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2006,  Cecilie graduated from Roskilde Katedralskole with a secondary school diploma.
 Cecilie received her degree from Copenhagen Business Academy in 2013.
Occupation History:
Cecilie Amanda Højgaard is a 36 year old General Manager from Spain.
In 2012,  Cecilie Amanda Højgaard started working as a Hotel Manager at Iberostar Hotels & Resorts S.A., marking the beginning of her successful career.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of General Manager at NH Hotel Group S.A. in 2018, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 590000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 1600000 EUR.


Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Neurosurgeon, she received an inheritance of 7300000 EUR in 2015, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
